lyric:
[by:假头套要被吹走啦]
[00:07.674]All I need is someone that's gon' love me
[00:18.994]All I ever wanted was the money
[00:22.533]I put that on my life that I been hungry
[00:26.077]I been through the rain, but now it's sunny for real
[00:30.078](Put that on my life, on my life)
[00:32.710]Put that on my life, eh (Put that on my life, on my life)
[00:36.220]I put that on my life, yeah (Put that on my life, on my life)
[00:39.809]It's not always alright, but I know I will make it through the hard times
[00:44.359]I know I can make it through the hard times
[00:48.171]I know I can make it through the hard times
[00:51.658]I remember they gave me a hard time
[00:55.160]I remember, I remember, I remember
[00:58.680]There's times when I been low
[01:03.594]But that's just how it goes
[01:07.421]Yeah, gotta fight through it
[01:10.895]Go and prove that you can do it
[01:13.671]Told myself imma live right
[01:17.633]Seems like I been right
[01:19.070]Now that money shit is in sight
[01:20.754]Yeah, never thought I'd be at this height
[01:24.560]Told my mama she gon' live right
[01:26.199]Me and Will got the biz right
[01:28.056]Yeah, true true true true
[01:31.361]Yeah, that's all I speak
[01:33.174]This the all star team
[01:35.091]We on BMF, we on TMZ
[01:38.533]We in scene after scene
[01:40.573]Man I'm living out a dream
[01:42.423]All I need is someone that's gon' love me
[01:46.306]All I ever wanted was the money
[01:49.410]I put that on my life that I been hungry
[01:52.907]I been through the rain, but now it's sunny for real
[01:57.094](Put that on my life, on my life)
[01:59.744]Put that on my life, eh (Put that on my life, on my life)
[02:03.175]I put that on my life, yeah (Put that on my life, on my life)
[02:06.927]It's not always alright, but I know I will make it through the hard times
[02:11.430]I know I can make it through the hard times
[02:15.427]I know I can make it through the hard times
[02:19.019]I remember they gave me a hard time
[02:22.395]I remember, I remember, I remember
tlyric:
[by:TONY_Gy]
[00:07.674]我需要一个我爱的人
[00:18.994]我也要把钞票堆成山
[00:22.533]对未来所向往的生活饥渴着
[00:26.077]一路上经历了狂风暴雨
[00:30.078]但现在已经晴空万里
[00:32.710]我要给我的人生写上一个完美句号
[00:36.220]我愿意把我的生命，放到这条路上
[00:39.809]前路不一定是通畅的，但我会攻克难关
[00:44.359]我会突破重重难关
[00:48.171]也会突破九九八十一难
[00:51.658]我记得他们对我恶语相加
[00:55.160]让我饱受伤害
[00:58.680]有时我会情绪低落
[01:03.594]但我还在坚持着
[01:07.421]我要战胜它
[01:10.895]我要向你们证明我能做到
[01:13.671]我告诉自己，我要好好生活
[01:17.633]很庆幸我做到了
[01:19.070]现在一堆堆钱摆在我面前
[01:20.754]不敢相信我竟然做到了
[01:24.560]告诉妈妈你要好好生活
[01:26.199]我和Will做到了
[01:28.056]别不相信，这是真的！！！
[01:31.361]我想告诉你我成功了
[01:33.174]全明星团队
[01:35.091]BMF，TMZ都有我们的身影
[01:38.533]我们在一个又一个场景中出现
[01:40.573]我的梦想正在慢慢实现
[01:42.423]我需要一个我爱的人
[01:46.306]我也要把钞票堆成山
[01:49.410]对未来所向往的生活饥渴着
[01:52.907]一路上经历了狂风暴雨
[01:57.094]但现在已经晴空万里
[01:59.744]我要给我的人生写上一个完美句号
[02:03.175]我愿意把我的生命，放到这条路上
[02:06.927]前路不一定是通畅的，但我会攻克难关
[02:11.430]我会突破重重难关
[02:15.427]也会突破九九八十一难
[02:19.019]我记得他们对我恶语相加让我饱受伤害
[02:22.395]但我不会就此屈服！
